and I will change the world of Fashion!
I introduce you Configo,
the first 3D bag configurator!
Try Configo!

titolo_area_shop: Anna Cloud has a big dream: to change the world of Fashion.
sottotitolo_area_shop: I need you. Ah, I was forgetting, I’m not a charlatan!
testo_area_shop: We don’t follow trends, dogmas or tendencies  imposed by the fashion world. We realize only personalized bags on demand with certified leather. Our philosophy is called Slow Fashion and  we believe in the digital and ecological revolution!
testo_5: We want to solve the problem of surplus in production with the use of the 3D configurator for an approach more aware of the sustainable Fashion: a bag at the time, zero waste and creativity at its must!
testo_6: A new approach also for the Shop section: Only Limited Edition. Colourful bags selected by your Anna, but still always on Demand!
testo_4:
Our Collection

The collection is inspired by geometric shapes that recall a return to simplicity and durability. With our creations we want to break the Status Quo and supply to our customers a continuous, functional and customizable product. To realize one of our bag takes time and time has a value. All you need is Slow!
jumbotron_configuratore_content:
To respect the environment we realize one bag at a time, without waste.
Let’s configure your own bag!
Try Configo!
jumbotron_configuratore_content_mobile:
To respect the environment we realize one bag at a time, without waste.
Let’s configure your own bag!
Try Configo!
testo_area_configuratore: Genuine leather has  its own characteristics: naturalness, circularity and durability. We use leather with the best environmental certifications on the market.
testo_post_preconfigurate:
If you are curios, you can find answers to all your questions on our Blog!

But don’t forget one thing, we are still a small brand. To change the world we need your support: leave us feedback, comments and advice. I know we need to grow and improve: we want to do this.
testo_7_titolo: People and time have a value.
testo_7:
Enter the world of Anna Cloud.
Help us to change things!
presentazione:
Here is Configo! Our 3D configurator

Choose a model and personalise your bag
sostenibile:
Anna Cloud is sustainable!

All bags are made with leathers that have the best environmental certifications on the market. We engage every day not to have waste of production and unsold: for this reason our Tuscan artisans make one bag at a time. To manufacture Anna Cloud bag are required 7 working days: less time as possible to pay most attention to you and to the environment. The bag you will receive is not any one bag: it will be a versatile, customizable product that will be with you forever without ever getting bored.
dettagli_prezzo:
22% VAT inc.
free shipping
delivery in 7 working days
dettagli_prezzo_mobile: 22% VAT inc. free shipping delivery in 7 working days
accedi_salvare:
Login
to save
blocco_1:
We don’t care of the imposed trends, dogmas and high prices. We do not pursue the usual ideals of perfect beauty, we are not in search of ostentation and beauty at all costs.

Don’t believe that these words are just made sentences: we are ordinary people, with qualities and weaknesses, even physical or of our character. But we are above all real people, not influenceable, innovative and attentive to environmental issues. These are the ideals of our Community!

to find out more...

Fly on our Blog
blocco_2:
Using our 3D configurator, we solve many environmental problems of the Fashion world. By manufacturing only On Demand, we don’t have unsold bags, reduce production waste, water and energy consumption.

Each bag is realized only for you, without waste and using genuine leather made in Italy with an environmental certify.

Customize now your bag
blocco_3:
Let’s talk about our Team.

We are a team of technological people by vocation who work hard to supply an ethical, sustainable and customizable product.

We have been working with passion in the world of leather goods and fashion for over two generations, combining craftsmanship and innovation to offer products of excellence.
shop_sottotitolo: The most colourful inspirations selected by your Anna Cloud
shop_titolo_preconfigurate: Relax and let yourself be inspired by Configo!
shop_sottotitolo_preconfigurate: If you prefer to customize it, see below some inspirations:
shop_scheda_descrizione:
Our bags are made with circular economy products. The soft quality leather we use is tanned in a green and sustainable way. The result is a fashionable, trendy product, carefully made by our Tuscan craftsmen and respectful of the environment. Wonderful!

Our philosophy marries innovation, tradition and eco-sustainability in every accessory.
shop_scheda_dati_piccola:
INFO

A practical bucket made with soft leather.

  • lined with durable cotton.
  • offers a convenient pocket with zip closure.
  • closure of the bucket decorated with hot stamp.
  • adjustable shoulder strap that allows you to wear it on the shoulder or across the body.
  • the color scheme preferred by our creative team.
Composition:Leather
Metal accessories:Nickel color
Height:22cm
Diameter:16.5cm

Made in Italy
